text: Brandi Glanville does not believe Omarosa Manigault never slept with her former boss, President Donald Trump. As previously reported, during Celebrity Big Brother, The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills alum asked Omarosa straight out — completely shocking the former political aide — if she had ever slept with Trump. “ Hell no, ” the former Apprentice star replied during the February 16 episode. “ Oh, my God. Brandi, that ’ s horrible! ” However, Glanville, 45, didn ’ t buy it! During an appearance on E! ’ s Daily Pop on Thursday, March 8, she was asked if she thought Omarosa was being honest. “ Nope, I don ’ t think so. Like how would they have that relationship for so long and he just keeps bringing her back, ”
